tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE dna_evidence (
  sample_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  crime_scene_id UUID NOT NULL,
  evidence_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dna_sequence TEXT NOT NULL,
  collection_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE dna_samples (
  sample_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_date DATE NOT NULL,
  suspect_id INT,
  crime_scene_id INT,
  dna_sequence TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE suspect_profiles (
    suspect_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    age INT,
    gender TEXT,
    dna_profile TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE forensic_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_scene_id UUID,
    suspect_id UUID,
    report_details TEXT,
    analysis_results TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE CrimeSceneEvidence (
  evidence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  evidence_type VARCHAR(50),
  crime_scene_id INT,
  collected_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE DNAProfiles (
  profile_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  evidence_id INT,
  dna_sequence TEXT,
  analysis_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Suspects (
  suspect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  height FLOAT,
  ethnicity VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Matches (
  match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  profile_id INT,
  suspect_id INT,
  match_confidence FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE ForensicScientists (
  scientist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  specialization VARCHAR(100),
  lab_location VARCHAR(50)
)
